Key Match Events: Vietnam defender Nguyen Thanh Binh received a yellow card and Indonesia scored a penalty
Pre-Game Insights: Indonesia opened with an attacking play as promised by Coach Shin Tae-Yong
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Shin lauded Asnawi Mangkualam's confidence and penalty execution
Indonesia's victory brought joy to fans after years of not qualifying for the Asian Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indonesia's first win in the Asian Cup since 2007
Potential clash with Australia in the last 16
